reviews.review: A great puzzle game, great storyline and good gameplay, makes you think outside the box, I recommend it!

I am a veteran of the Portal series because I have played Portal 1 and 2 since release. Portal 2 is a solid game even though it has stale content, when new content comes out it is most of the time good. when bad releases *cough* shadowkeep *cough* there are still good parts of the dlc or new season. tldr the game is the only i have 1000 hours in
Everything that made Portal great....but just more of it.  Humour? Yep! Great Puzzles? Yep! Science? Yep!  What's not to love?
good game very nice please play
Сейчас в тренде ПОВЕЗЛО ПОВЕЗЛО, оставлю это в памяти здесь
Я чуть не лишился своего чумбы...
jogo bom demais, quebrar cabeça em jogo é bom, o ruim é quebrar cabeça com mulher, aaaaaaooooooo coração apaixonado
Juste géniale il vaut beacoup plus que son prix recomandé a 1000%
i can do funny flip in co-op, is good
Este juego si que es MUY entretenido B)

Oyun gerçekten çok güzel portal serisinin en iyi oyunu bence birkaç kere bitirdim ayrıca hikayesi çok güzel ayrıca hikayesi bir noktadan sonra oyunun hikayesini daha güzel bir şekilde anlatıyorlar youtube da onun dışında klasik portal ve mekanikleri kesinlikle oynamanızı tavsiye ederim
This is one of the games I played a lot in my childhood and I'm so happy I revisited it to complete it. A classic you must play.

Esse jogo é maravilhoso.

Uns dos melhores jogos que já joguei e mais uma obra-prima da Valve.

Todos já conhecem e jogaram, e se ainda não jogou, jogue, não vai se arrepender.
Loved it. Co-op was a blast too.
Now I Completed This Game Like 2 Years Ago But I'm not Done With Co op But Still VERY Fun Game!

Segue a continuação de Portal 1. Alguns Plot twists na história e inovação nos puzzles. A jogabilidade e os gráficos estão ótimos, e a história também está excelente! Gostei bastante das últimas cenas do jogo! Final épico!

This is hands down, the best pc game I have ever played. The story is a very well crafted one; taking on an overarching narrative, that still is fresh almost 10 years later, after it's initial release/success. I hope that they make a third one, but one can only hope :(. It left me longing for more, due the beautifully crafted and memorable story that is at hand. The humor is next to none, and it left me in stitches, throughout. :)
hah spoilers but glados's real name is caroline
i loved everything about this game

1편에서 보여준 퍼즐과 게임의 완벽한 조화에
훌륭한 스토리 전개를 더했다.
이건 거의 예술의 수준이다.
купил за 15 грн. как сяоми, топ за свои деньги
güzel oyun oynarken beyninizin yanma ihtimali var dikkat edin
es muy divertido y te ase pensar mucho lo recomiendo

一点都不好玩，也就玩到不想吃饭！！！
此游戏电脑配置需求不高，对脑细胞数量要求极高，或者脑细胞不够，用肝来凑！！！
不推荐去看攻略，独自思考能锻炼脑子，或者让自己意识到自己脑子有多不好。
游戏背景令人深思，对人工智能的一种假象未来。
现实一直都是人类去测试人工智能，或许有一天人工智能超越了人类，就会像这游戏里那样，人工智能去测试人类。
强烈推荐！！！！！！建议玩之前吃饱一点，一旦开始，脑子就会思考不停，以至于忘记及饥饿！！！
the cake is not a lie
good game but hard... much hard
its a horror game. i don't like horror games but this is amazing!
Ich mag Portel weil man Rätseln muss und es macht einfach spaß

A pretty original physics puzzle game. I also liked the funny comments from the robots and little background story.

It gets a bit repetitive after a while but all in all I would still recommend it.

Definitely recommend this game if you can get it on sale. It is by far the best puzzle game I have played. The single player campaign is excellent. There are also a ton of community maps to try out too after you complete the game.
Прошел сюжетную линию за 3-5 часов.Игра очень прикольная и продуманная.
le meileur jeu inventé par l'homme
Одна из самых крутых игр от Valve
yani iyi bi hikayeye sahip ve gerçekten kaliteli bi oyun yani yıllar önce çıkmış olmasına rağmen grafikleri halen taş gibi yani oyun parasını dibine kadar hakkediyo
Still one of the greatest single player games of all time. 10/10 would recommend.
很好玩，但是室友说我的电脑带不动玩起来太卡了，直接退款了，只要不玩他就不说电脑卡-------来自二十年前的电脑评测
Игра топ за свои деньги очень много заданий

Years ago, me and my sister bought portal 2 for the xbox 360 and beat the co-op missions together, but I realized with all the fun we had years ago, I never beat the single player missions. well, 10 or so years later, I finally fixed that. what a great game! don't google hints! it ruins the game. just play and be stuck at your own pace.

엔딩볼때 이제 트릭을 안깨도 되는구나 라는 생각만 들었다.
스토리와 트릭비중이 포탈1에서랑은 다르게 트릭에 너무 치중되있는것 같다.
트릭을 위해 스토리를 만들었다는 맹목적인 느낌만 플레이 내내 들게 만들었다.
